p: Multiple alignments of nucleotide and amino acid sequences were performed using MAFFT 7 online version [ 27]. The Gblocks program [ 28] was used for the extraction of conserved domains/sequences of aligned sequences. Finding suitable amino acid substitution models and constructing dendrograms was carried out on MEGA ver. 6 [ 29]. The maximum likelihood method, with 1000 bootstrap replicates, was used in constructing all the dendrograms. Bootstrap support is indicated by values on branches.
